metadata.title: CVE-2021-29972 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found via testing, and traced to an out-of-date Cairo library. Updating the library resolved the issue, and may have remediated other, unknown security vulnerabilities as well. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 90.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '90.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
